@graph.title: Encountering urban places : visual and material performances in the city
@graph.abstract: Encountering urban places : visual and material performances in the city / Lars Frers and Lars Meier -- Urban aesthetics and the excess of fact / Helen Liggett -- Perception, aesthetics, and envelopment : encountering space and materiality / Lars Frers -- Eye-catchers. Staging the sociosexual  : the example of prostitution / Martina Löw -- Urban spaces re-defined in daily practices : Minibar, Ankara / Deniz Altay -- An uncommon common space / Zeuler R.M.A. Lima and Vera M. Pallamin -- Seeing succession in Little and Big Italy : encountering ethnic vernacular landscapes / Jerome Krase -- Working in the skyline : images and everyday action / Lars Meier -- Simulation or hospitality :  beyond the crisis of representation in Nowa Huta / Łukasz Stanek -- Sensing place :  mobile and wireless technologies in urban space / Katharine S. Willis -- Working with the visual / Lars Frers and Lars Meier
